issue.title: Broken tooltips with scatter line chart

repository.name: Chart.js
repository.description: Simple HTML5 Charts using the <canvas> tag

issue.body:
I have **scatter line chart** with two datasets and **tooltips set to "label" mode**. **First dataset have 2 values and second 3 values.**

In this configuration some values have broken tooltips - tooltip will not show and chart will fail in console with message "Chart.bundle.js:11561 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property '_index' of undefined".

This is because first dataset is missing first value.

Can be reproduced by this code - http://codepen.io/kolinger/pen/YWqyxg?editors=0010
Try hover on 
x=Jan 12, 10AM 
y=15

Tested with lastest version (2.1.4).

issue.title: tooltips/hover modes issue

repository.name: Chart.js
repository.description: Simple HTML5 Charts using the <canvas> tag

issue.body:
Actually, modes 'label' and 'a-axis' highlights the elements by Index of the array of data in each series.
This is the problem with scatter line chart when 'x' value of the data for each series is different.
The highlighted points will not be on the same 'vertical line' as the 'x' value is actually is the position of the data point on a-axis.

If it is not a bug, it would be nessessary to set an option to mode working with 'x' value of the data and not with arrays index.
